hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base

Class Actions

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Actions

  • public final class Actions
extends Object
    Helper class for Action interfaces.
    Author:
    akarnokd

                                                   Action1E<? super U,? extends E> second)
